titlepage.titleproper: A Guide to the Franca Helg Architectural Papers, 1989
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Special Collections Ms2001-025
titlepage.publisher: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The Franca Helg Architectural Papers consist of an article that Helg wrote in 1989, as well as a catalog about Helg.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Franca Helg Architectural Papers, Ms2001-025 - Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Franca Helg Architectural Papers were donated to Special Collections.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Franca Helg Architectural Papers commenced and was completed in July 2001. The Franca Helg Architectural Papers were added to the IAWA Small Collections Ms2009-054 in September 2009.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Franca Helg was born in Milan in 1920.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Franca Helg Architectural Papers consist of an article that Helg wrote in 1989 entitled "Franco Albini-Architect and Teacher", as well as a catalog about Helg.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: See also the IAWA Small Collections. Finding aid available on the Virginia Heritage database.

did.unittitle: Article entitled Franco Albini-Architect and Teacher, and a catalog of Helg's work, 1988-89.
